detailedSolution: Caden is correct because Graph E could be untangled so that d is to the left of c and the edges bc and ad are no longer crossed. Maubi is incorrect because (a, b, c, d) is a quadrilateral in Graph E. Javier is incorrect because the portion of the graph he highlighted does not have 3 vertices and is not a triangle.
